EPETITION_PLUGIN: {item:$subject} has posted a new petition entry: {item:$object}.
Petition Plugin: {item:$subject} has posted a new Petition entry: {item:$object}.
This email is sent to someone when a Petition entry is posted by a member to whom they have subscribed.

[header]

[sender_title] has posted a new Petition entry: [object_title].
Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
SES - Petition - Claim Request to Petition Owner
This email is sent to the Petition owner when a member claim their Petition.
A member has claimed your Petition.

[header]

[sender_title] has sent you a message using the Claim For Petition page:
SES - Petition - Claim Request to Site Owner
This email is sent to site owners to take action on claim request for Petition.
A member has claimed a Petition.

[header]

[sender_title] has sent you a message to take action on the claim request for Petition:

[message]

[footer]
SES - Petition - Claim Approval to Petition Owner
This email is sent to the Petition owner when site admin approve the claim request of Petition.
Site owner has approved your claim request for the Petition.

[header]

[sender_title] has sent you a message for approval of the claim:

[message]

[footer]
SES - Petition - Claim Approval to Petition Owner
This email is sent to the Petition owner when site admin approve the claim request of Petition.
Site owner has approved your claim request for the Petition.

[header]

[sender_title] has sent you a message for approval of the claim:

[message]

[footer]
SES - Petition - Claim Rejection to Claimer
This email is sent to the claimer when site admin rejects the claim request of Petition.
Site owner has rejected your claim request for the Petition.

[header]

[sender_title] has sent you a message for rejection of the claim:

[message]

[footer]
